title: Supreme Court Rules on Trump Travel Ban (Audio)
itunes:title: Supreme Court Rules on Trump Travel Ban (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Josh Blackman, a professor at South Texas College of Law, discusses the news of the day from the Supreme Court, including decisions on President Trump's controversial travel ban. He spoke with Bloomberg Law Hosts June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
